CLUE: New York borough and island in Bay

FOUND IN: Immerse oneself in a fluid environment
Lambada: Originally a dance form developed in Belém, Pará, but later became associated with the louder and more sensual versions that emerged globally

Picky eater (can lead to hunger if not addressed) - Someone who is selective about food choices; if the pickiness results in a limited diet that does not provide necessary sustenance, it may indirectly cause hunger or malnourishment
